contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Desvres |image = |caption = |image coat of arms = Blason Desvres.svg |region = [[Nord-Pas-de-Calais]] |department = [[Pas-de-Calais]] |arrondissement = [[Arrondissement of Boulogne-sur-Mer|Boulogne-sur-Mer]] |canton = [[Canton of Desvres|Desvres]] |INSEE = 62268 |postal code = 62240 |mayor = Gérard Pécron |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = [[Communauté de communes de Desvres - Samer]] |longitude = 1.8353 |latitude = 50.6686 |elevation min m = 42 |elevation max m = 208 |area km2 = 9.42 |population = 5056 |population date = 2006 |demonym = |website = }} '''Desvres''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Pas-de-Calais]] [[Departments of France|department]] in northern [[France]]. It is a market town, known for its pottery. In 1999 its population was 5,260 inhabitants for the commune and 14,164 inhabitants for the [[Canton of Desvres|canton]]. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] ==External links== * [http://www.theotherside.co.uk/tm-heritage/towns/desvres.htm Desvres] * [http://www.desvresmuseum.org/ Musée de la Céramique] {{Commons category|Desvres}} {{Pas-de-Calais communes}} [[Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais]] {{PasdeCalais-geo-stub}}
